adrFormatAddress: 1795 Riverside Dr #2f, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: We loved our experience at CTB, our son started there when he was three and a half months old and the staff there was so wonderful and caring we never had any worries about leaving him there even though he was so young. He bloomed into a very social baby and always seemed to love going there. I feel very thankful to Patricia, Fresia and everyone there for helping us through those first months, you can tell they really care about the kids, they keep them busy with so many varied activities, they always gave me precious advice AND set him on a regular nap schedule. We moved and will miss all of them dearly, I can't recommend this daycare enough.

originalText.text: My son went to CTB daycare and the place is incredible, like a second home with extra enrichment. Shaney and her staff are kind, loving and patient, and they set routines that include music, baby yoga, movement and other classes with guest teachers every week. The staff home-cook healthy meals and my son prefers their cooking to ours at home! He has been so happy and on a great nap routine since being with CTB. We feel so lucky we found this daycare, it is a gem of a place!

text.text: My son went to CTB daycare and the place is incredible, like a second home with extra enrichment. Shaney and her staff are kind, loving and patient, and they set routines that include music, baby yoga, movement and other classes with guest teachers every week. originalText.text:
We sent our little one to CTB from 10 weeks to 10 months old. She was so excited to be dropped off every day and we were so grateful for the amazing care the women there took of her. They organized fantastic classes and really taught her (and us!) so much. Everyone there is incredibly responsive and they use an amazing app to keep us updated all day.

We are only leaving because of a job transfer. We miss everyone at CTB!

originalText.text: Our son has been at CTB since he was 15 months old, he is now 3.5. Shaney and her staff have always cared for him as though he was family. They communicate frequently, are flexible and kind. Music, sign language, arts & crafts, movement- our son has activities daily that are fun, safe and age appropriate both indoors and out. We could not recommend them more. They have been an integral part of our sons development and we are so thankful to Shaney and the entire staff.

originalText.text: We sent our daughter to Caterpillars to Butterflies since she was 2. She’s 4 now and still attending! The staff is absolutely amazing. They are warm and loving. They are so accommodating and offered a flexible schedule for our family’s particular needs. I love the communication we receive as well as daily photos and sometimes videos. I would recommend this daycare to anyone!
